name: sightedguidetechniquesofshirogame
0:
”Alexa, open sighted guide techniques of shirogame”
”Alexa, start sighted guide techniques of shirogame”
”Alexa, run sighted guide techniques of shirogame”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sighted guide techniques of shirogame
des:
You can learn the basic methods for safely guiding visually impaired persons using a quiz format.
Take the quiz as if you were a sighted guide to a visually impaired person.
There are 11 scenes such as taking a seat on a chair, passing through a door, descending and ascending stairs, and use of a taxi, a bus and a train, etc.
These techniques are based on nonprofit organization Shirogame's method, which was published in a Japanese book.
For any questions about the skill, please contact skill@shirogame.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
